resources.string: Offer yourself a warm greeting as you settle in.
Take this moment to pause from the busyness of life and simply be here.
Reflect on the stillness you cultivated. Carry this sense of calm into the rest of your day.
0-3 min: Sit or lie down comfortably with a gentle upright posture. Close your eyes or soften your gaze, noticing that you are here in this moment.
3-7 min: Bring awareness to the sensations in your body. Slowly scan from head to toe, observing any tension or warmth without judgment.
7-12 min: Observe the natural rhythm of your breathing. Feel each inhalation and exhalation. If the mind wanders, kindly return to the breath.
12-17 min: Notice any emotions or thoughts that arise. Recognize them without trying to push them away, letting them drift like clouds.
17-23 min: Offer yourself gentle words: 'I am doing my best. I am okay in this moment.' Extend silent well-wishes to others: 'May you be peaceful.'
23-27 min: Bring your attention back to the physical sensations of your body. Feel your contact with the floor or chair and gently awaken your hands and shoulders.
27-30 min: Slowly open your eyes and complete the practice with gratitude. Remember you can return to this calm whenever you wish.
